title: Vector Basemaps
description: Displays an attractive background map using vector tiles from the ThinkGeo Cloud.

title: Raster Basemaps
description: Displays an attractive background map using raster tiles from the ThinkGeo Cloud.

title: Mark the Places
description: Shows how to mark a place with beautiful icons and detailed information.

title: Popup
description: Shows how to display a popup balloon with images and descriptions included.

title: Draw and Modify Geometries
description: Shows how to draw and modify the geometries loaded on the map.

title: Measure Distance & Area
description: Demonstrates how to measure distances and areas on the map.

title: Vehicle Tracking
description: A simple vehicle tracking sample showing how to plot markers, interact with features and manipulate the map.

title: Basic Styling
description: Visualize your data with some of ThinkGeo's built-in styles, including PointStyle, LineStyle, AreaStyle, CompoundStyles, and PredefinedStyles.

title: Load Feature Source
description: Shows how to render common vector-based GIS formats on your map, including ESRI ShapeFile and more.

title: Load Raster Source
description: Shows how to render common raster-based GIS formats on your map, including GeoTiff, ECW and more.

title: Work with OGC Services
description: Shows how to work with OGC standard services such as WMS, WFS, WMTS etc. in ThinkGeo UI Web for Blazor.

title: Use different projections
description: Shows how to convert a layer's projection from EPSG:4326 to another projection.

title: Geometric Functions
description: Shows how to explore all the different APIs for Geometric Functions.

title: Spatial Query
description: Shows how to select features by running a Spatial Query.

title: US Demographic Map
description: Gives you a head start on your statistics project, which includes details about race, age, gender, land usage, and more for all the states in U.S.
